feed.title: Category: S.C.A.T.: Special Cybernetic Attack Team | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: S.C.A.T.: Special Cybernetic Attack Team (NES, 1990)
entry.content:
I played this game until the boss of the third stage. I used one continue on the first stage getting to know the systems; I used another at the beginning of stage two and stage three; then I got to the boss of stage three and died. Stage three was incredibly painful on the eyes because the background scroll so much.

The game was a very competent shooter from that era, with the standard complaints for someone that loves CAVE. The idea that you are person is kind of cute and the rotating options are neat too. But, the game doesn't have enough distinctive to feel special.

Total time: 0:21
